resources.string:
v2.1.11-04
 Location Fixes:
 Erie County, PA
 Juniata County, PA
 Charleston County, SC
 
 v2.1.11-03
 For Active911 users under Android 10. Cadpage now requests permission to report your location when it is not active.
 
 Location Fixes:
 Chatham County, GA
 Brunswick County, NC
 Nash County, NC
 Erie County, PA
 Lufkin, TX
 Mecklenburg County, VA
 
 v2.1.11-02
 Second attempt at implementing updated MMS alert processing. This time there is a new setting to disable it and use the old logic. Default will be to use old logic for existing users and new logic for new users. Using the new logic requires an update to the support app.
 
 v2.10-05
